website_summaries.verdict: This product is for people who prefer the lightweight plastic tire swing, but are still looking for a more heavy duty chain hanger.
pros: Includes 4 chain attachment points instead of the 3 on many swings
Rubberized coating on the chains helps prevent pinched fingers
Plastic swing with heavy duty metal chains
Plenty big to fit more than 1 child
A good quality product for the money
cons: This item can be returned if you decide its not what you want, but you may get a heavy restocking fee

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, but lots of fun!
customer_reviews.text: Grandkids love it. Easy to install. Glad it's lightweight so it's not a hazard to other kids. The material is a very bright green, but at least it doesn't rub off on the kids skin and clothing the way an actual rubber tire does.
customer_reviews.author: G.M.

customer_reviews.title: Fun will be Had, Solidly Built
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter wanted one of these for our set after she played on a similar one at another family's house. This version fits our Creative Playthings set great and matches the quality we expect from CP.
customer_reviews.author: PeeArrow

customer_reviews.title: Super kid friendly
customer_reviews.text: We have a grandchild with a severe latex allergy and purchased this swing to replace and old tire swing. No more tears because she can't play on the swing. She's now joining in the fun with the others and they all love it!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Ferris

customer_reviews.title: Price high
customer_reviews.text: Flimsy small for price or maybe my kids just need something bigger
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: Single Axis Tire Swing
customer_reviews.text: This great swing hangs from the large tree in my front yard. It was purchased for my great grandson's third birthday for him to have each time he comes to visit. The best purchase of all. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: dianne oler

customer_reviews.title: Disapointed and We returned Swing
customer_reviews.text: We decided to return the swing because it was not what we expected. We ordered a "Tire Swing" and expected it to be that, but it was a plastic tire that was much smaller and less sturdy than we expected. Because this company charged a Restocking Fee, we had to pay the return shipping plus Restocking Fee. We ended up losing about $45.00. I now realize that some suppliers have different rules than Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Williams

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Tire Swing
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the Tire Swing for 4 year old - Totally love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret R.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We hung this swing from a big tree in the backyard and our granddaughter and the neighbor kids love it. We usually have 3 seven year olds swinging on it at one time. I wanted this type because it is fully enclosed so water won't stand in it like a real tire. It does come with the chains seen in the photo, but we bought a clip to hold the chains together at the top and hooked it to another chain which we put around the tree branch.
customer_reviews.author: J. Myers

customer_reviews.title: Grand daughter is 9 and loves it !!!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and was very easy to hang in the old oak tree !!! 4 year old grandson loves it also !!!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: My 4 year old loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tire swing. My son loves playing on it with his friends. Very sturdy. Hard plastic will likely last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Albert

customer_reviews.title: FUN  FUN  FUN
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tire swing for my 6 year old granddaughter. I was worried that she would be disappointed that it was not a real tire. She never had one complaint. She loves it! You do have to buy the proper nylon rope, one connection ring and find a good tree limb. Rain cannot get inside this tire swing. The color does not come off. It is smaller than advertised....but two children can swing comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Durham

product_meta.title: Creative Playthings Single Axis Tire Swing with Chain
product_meta.description: The Single Axis Tire Swing is available with chain only and is a twist on an old favorite. This swing can be used by one or two swingers at the same time! Our adaptation is a "To and Fro," back and forth swing can be attached to an existing swing set.
feature_bullets: Swing set accessory makes great addition to swing sets

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars37 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
